channel.title: Online Image Based Sexual Abuse on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Online Image Based Sexual Abuse on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: 118 days since… still no justice for those targeted by the “Sulli Deals” incident.
item.description: We wrote to the Delhi Police asking them to expeditiously investigate the ‘Sulli Deals’ incident to provide closure and support to those targeted.

item.title: The Internet Should Not Become a Boys Club
item.description: We wrote to the WCD Ministry and DCW about the need to address image based sexual abuse on the internet in a rights respecting manner in light of the recent ‘Boiz Locker Room’ incident.
